span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 拖欠(债务)： to fail to pay financial debts, the nonperformance of an assigned or expected action
【例】 default on a loan 拖欠贷款
【近】 delinquency, dereliction[,dɛrə'lɪkʃən], misprision, nonfeasance, oversight
【反】 pay one's debt 偿还债务
【记】 de 加强 + fault 没有按照法律，义务，债务去履行
